lead_paragraph: Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal was at his bizarre best again after his team's 1-1 Premier league draw with Leicester City as he complained that a hair-pulling incident during the match was only acceptable in "sex masochism".

headline.print_headline: Van Gaal at Eccentric Best in 'Sex Masochism' Outburst
headline.main: Van Gaal at Eccentric Best in 'Sex Masochism' Outburst
